welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pachkhal, Nepal! Get ready to experience the beauty and tranquility of this charming city, known for its stunning mountain views and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pachkhal has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manang Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles the transportation of goods and supplies to and from Manang Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights departing and arriving at Tribhuvan International Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights departing and arriving at Tribhuvan International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for 2 hours by providing their email address.
